answers.answer: Nervous about what? Doc has gave you the ok right well go ahead and ttc@! Do you really want this or what I mean I know you do so what are you waiting on !!! Baby Dust id all over  you girl I hope you get what you wish for and sooner thab you think!!!!!!!!!!!!

BethieI know it is scary to think about having a baby.  There are a lot of emotions involved, but when you add diabetes into the mixture it becomes complicated even more.  You are a strong woman already living with this disease, and have jumped hurdles already, getting pregnant and having a baby is just a little bump in the road :) It will be fine, just follow your dr's instructions, eat healthy, take your prenatals now and enjoy the adventure. Please keep us informed as you go and have fun!!

question: I am a type 1 diabetic on the pump, I have been cleared through my Dr. to go ahead and start trying.  Well now I'm really nervous and scared about all sorts of things. I just need some words of incourgement if any one has any that would be great.  Thanx in advance
title: getting ready to start trying to get pregnant.
